attributes.action: NO mandatory COVID-19 or flu vaccination for health and social care workers!
attributes.additional_details: Because what other option do we have?
attributes.background:
It should be down to personal choice and not forced on to people! Especially in a sector that is already struggling.
Do not mandate COVID-19 and flu vaccinations for health and social care workers!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for a similar action: 

Do not require a Covid passport for access to any services, jobs or events:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593122

Do not make flu vaccination a requirement for health and social care workers:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596957
